LanguageData.Avali.label: avali
LanguageData.Avali.description: A small feathered raptor-like creature with big eyes and four ears.\nKnown for their bad temper and a love of the musical arts and shiny things.

LanguageData.Avali.tools.3.label: right feet talons

LanguageData.Avali.tools.5.label: right hand

LanguageData.Avali.tools.7.label: right feet
